about_the_game: Take a musical trip to Eurus-d, and relive your favorite moments of adversity, awe and suspense from Between Horizons. A unique mix of futuristic synths, catchy themes, and jazzy piano, this atmospheric soundtrack was composed by Julian Colbus, the creator of the highly praised Lacuna OST.
detailed_description: Take a musical trip to Eurus-d, and relive your favorite moments of adversity, awe and suspense from Between Horizons. A unique mix of futuristic synths, catchy themes, and jazzy piano, this atmospheric soundtrack was composed by Julian Colbus, the creator of the highly praised Lacuna OST.

fullgame.name: Between Horizons – A Sci-Fi Detective Adventure

legal_notice: Copyright DigiTales Interactive GmbH and Assemble Entertainment GmbH 2024 - all rights reserved!
name: Between Horizons Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 750 MB available space

short_description: Take a musical trip to Eurus-d, and relive your favorite moments from Between Horizons with this atmospheric sci-fi soundtrack.
